citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 3pm on Tuesday,
November 26, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the facility and spoke with a relative. They informed the inspector
the facility representative was not at home. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is
a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 3pm on Tuesday, 
November 26, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the facility and spoke with a relative. They informed the inspector 
the facility representative was not at home. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is 
a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
